patthana1.8:8.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:8.2: pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho, dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:8.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.8:9.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:9.2: pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:9.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #2

patthana1.8:10.2: pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:10.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #3

patthana1.8:11.2: sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.

patthana1.8:12.2: sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:12.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #2
patthana1.8:13.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:13.2: sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:13.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #3

patthana1.8:14.2: upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.

patthana1.8:15.2: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
patthana1.8:15.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1

patthana1.8:16.2: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:16.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #2
patthana1.8:17.1: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:17.2: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:17.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #3
patthana1.8:19.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.8:22.1: Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe dasa, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbattha dasa.
patthana1.8:28.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:28.2: ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.8:29.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:29.2: ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #2
patthana1.8:30.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:30.2: ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #3
patthana1.8:31.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:31.2: ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #1
patthana1.8:32.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:32.2: ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #2
patthana1.8:33.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:33.2: ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #3
patthana1.8:34.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:34.2: ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:34.3: Ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana1.8:34.4: Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.8:35.1: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:35.2: ahetukaṃ pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā. #1
patthana1.8:36.1: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:36.2: ahetukaṃ pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagatā dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #2
patthana1.8:37.1: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.8:37.2: ahetukaṃ pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #3
patthana1.8:39.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (naadhipatipaṭisandhikkhaṇe paripuṇṇaṃ) …
patthana1.8:41.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.8:42.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—
patthana1.8:45.1: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā … pe ….
patthana1.8:47.1: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.8:47.2: sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #1
patthana1.8:48.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—
patthana1.8:48.2: catuviññāṇasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe paṭicca eko khandho. #1
patthana1.8:49.1: (Namaggapaccayā nahetupaccayasadisaṃ. Moho natthi. Navippayuttapaccayā paripuṇṇaṃ, arūpapañhameva.)
patthana1.8:52.1: Nahetuyā dasa, naadhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke dasa, najhāne dve, namagge dasa, navippayutte dasa.
patthana1.8:56.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā dasa, napurejāte dasa, napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke navippayutte dasa.
patthana1.8:61.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dasa, anantare dasa, samanantare dasa, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne sabbe dasa, magge ekaṃ, sampayutte dasa, vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate sabbe dasa.
patthana1.8:69.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:69.2: pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:69.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.8:70.1: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:70.2: pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:71.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:71.2: pītisahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:72.5: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa … pe ….
patthana1.8:73.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:73.2: upekkhāsahagatā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:74.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa … pe …
patthana1.8:74.5: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:74.6: pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca hetū sampayuttakānaṃ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:76.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:76.2: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ pītisahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:76.3: Ariyā pītisahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:76.4: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:76.5: taṃ ārabbha pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:76.6: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā khandhā uppajjanti. #1
patthana1.8:77.1: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:77.2: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ sukhasahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:77.3: Ariyā sukhasahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:77.4: Pītisahagate khandhe sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:77.5: taṃ ārabbha sukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:77.6: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha sukhasahagatā khandhā uppajjanti. #2
patthana1.8:78.1: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:78.2: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:78.3: Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:78.4: Pītisahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:78.5: taṃ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.8:78.6: Cetopariyañāṇena pītisahagatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, pītisahagatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:78.7: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana1.8:79.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:79.2: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:79.3: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena pītisahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:79.4: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:79.5: taṃ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:79.6: Pītisahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #4
patthana1.8:80.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.8:80.6: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:80.7: sukhasahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #4
patthana1.8:81.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:81.2: upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhāsahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ upekkhāsahagatena cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:81.3: Ariyā upekkhāsahagatena cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:81.4: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:81.5: taṃ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.8:81.10: Upekkhāsahagatā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:81.11: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti. #1
patthana1.8:82.5: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:82.6: upekkhāsahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati, upekkhāsahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā phalā vuṭṭhahitvā, taṃ pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:82.7: Ariyā pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena upekkhāsahagate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.8:82.8: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti assādenti abhinandanti;
patthana1.8:82.9: taṃ ārabbha pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.8:82.10: Upekkhāsahagate khandhe ārabbha pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā uppajjanti. #3
patthana1.8:83.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa … pe …
patthana1.8:83.6: pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā … pe …
patthana1.8:83.8: pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe upekkhāsahagatena cittena aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.8:83.9: taṃ ārabbha upekkhāsahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.8:83.11: Pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:83.12: Pītisahagate ca sukhasahagate ca khandhe ārabbha upekkhāsahagatā khandhā uppajjanti. #3

patthana1.8:86.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:86.4: pītisahagatena cittena dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā pītisahagatena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pītisahagatā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā pītisahagatena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.8:86.5: Pītisahagate khandhe pītisahagatena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.8:86.6: taṃ garuṃ katvā pītisahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.

patthana1.8:139.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:139.5: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca saddhaṃ upanissāya pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.8:139.6: Pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.8:139.15: patthanaṃ upanissāya pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.8:139.19: Pītisahagatena ca sukhasahagatena ca cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, samphaṃ palapati, sandhiṃ chindati, nillopaṃ harati, ekāgārikaṃ karoti, paripanthe tiṭṭhati, paradāraṃ gacchati, gāmaghātaṃ karoti, nigamaghātaṃ karoti.
patthana1.8:139.20: Pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca saddhā … pe …
patthana1.8:139.22: patthanā pītisahagatāya ca sukhasahagatāya ca saddhāya … pe …
patthana1.8:141.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:141.2: purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ pītisahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:142.1: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:142.2: purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:142.3: Pītisahagataṃ anulomaṃ sukhasahagatassa gotrabhussa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:142.4: Pītisahagataṃ anulomaṃ sukhasahagatassa vodānassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:142.6: pītisahagataṃ vodānaṃ sukhasahagatassa maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.8:143.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:143.2: purimā purimā pītisahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.8:143.4: pītisahagataṃ vodānaṃ pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.8:144.5: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:145.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:145.2: purimā purimā upekkhāsahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana1.8:145.4: upekkhāsahagataṃ vodānaṃ upekkhāsahagatassa maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.8:146.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa … pe …
patthana1.8:146.5: pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:146.6: purimā purimā pītisahagatā ca sukhasahagatā ca khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.8:146.8: pītisahagatañca sukhasahagatañca vodānaṃ pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.8:148.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:148.4: pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:148.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:148.7: pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṃ pītisahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.8:149.1: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:149.4: pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:149.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:149.7: pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṃ sukhasahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.8:150.1: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:150.3: pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.8:151.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:151.4: pītisahagatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:151.8: pītisahagatā cetanā vipākānaṃ pītisahagatānañca sukhasahagatānañca khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.8:153.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:154.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:155.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:156.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:157.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa dhammassa.
patthana1.8:159.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.8:159.2: pītisahagato vipāko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana1.8:159.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe pītisahagato eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.8:160.1: (Yathā paṭiccavāre hetupaccaye evaṃ vitthāretabbā dasa pañhā.)
patthana1.8:162.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … atthipaccayena paccayo … (dasa pañhā vitthāretabbā) natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … (natthipi vigatampi anantarasadisaṃ) avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.8:165.1: Hetuyā dasa, ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa, aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa, āsevane dasa, kamme soḷasa, vipāke dasa, āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte atthiyā dasa, natthiyā soḷasa, vigate soḷasa, avigate dasa.
patthana1.8:169.1: Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.8:170.1: Pītisahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.8:171.1: Pītisahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #3

patthana1.8:177.1: Upekkhāsahagato dhammo upekkhāsahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #1

patthana1.8:182.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #2

patthana1.8:184.1: Pītisahagato ca sukhasahagato ca dhammā pītisahagatassa ca sukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.8:188.1: Nahetuyā soḷasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare nasahajāte naaññamaññe nanissaye naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge nasampayutte navippayutte noatthiyā nonatthiyā novigate noavigate sabbattha soḷasa.
patthana1.8:193.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dasa, naadhipatiyā dasa, naanantare nasamanantare naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme navipāke naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate sabbattha dasa.
patthana1.8:198.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe soḷasa, adhipatiyā anantare samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte dasa, aññamaññe dasa, nissaye dasa, upanissaye soḷasa, āsevane dasa, kamme soḷasa, vipāke dasa, āhāre dasa, indriye dasa, jhāne dasa, magge dasa, sampayutte dasa, atthiyā dasa, natthiyā soḷasa, vigate soḷasa, avigate dasa.
